name: Muslims in a Global Context: America
base_name: Muslims in a Global Context: America
long_desc: This is a joint WEEKEND course between CMU and the University of Pittsburgh.  It will be held on the University of Pittsburghs campus on March 1820, 2016.  Please check the Pitt website at httpwww.ucis.pitt.eduglobalminicourseamerica for current updates.  If you have any questions regarding registration, please email Cathy Ribarchak at cr2andrew.cmu.edu or call 4122688677.  Thank you.
